trans-unit.source: Provides additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关加密密钥对的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to obtain additional information about a key pair, such as the key container name or the key number.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于获取有关密钥对，如密钥容器名称或键数的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: In cases where a random key is generated by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>, a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key.
trans-unit.target: 在其中通过生成一个随机密钥的情况下<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>，直到你调用的方法，将使用的密钥，将不会创建的密钥容器。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Some properties of the CspKeyContainerInfo class will throw a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> if a key container has not been created.
trans-unit.target: CspKeyContainerInfo 类的某些属性将引发<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>如果尚未创建的密钥容器。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo"></xref> class using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo"></xref>类使用指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref> object that provides information about the key.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"> </xref>对象，提供有关所按键的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a key in a key container is accessible.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可访问的密钥容器中的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is accessible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该密钥是可访问︰否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key type is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持的密钥类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象表示访问权限和审核规则的容器。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity> object that manages the creation of discretionary access control lists (DACLS) and system access control lists (SACLS) for a container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>属性，以检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity>对象，用于管理创建的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 和系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 容器。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"> </xref>对象表示访问权限和审核规则的容器。

trans-unit.source: The key type is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持的密钥类型。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到加密服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- The key container was not found.
trans-unit.target: -或者-找不到密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a key can be exported from a key container.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以从密钥容器中导出密钥。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key can be exported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以导出该密钥;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key type is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持的密钥类型。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到加密服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- The key container was not found.
trans-unit.target: -或者-找不到密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a key is a hardware key.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示一个键是否硬件密钥。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is a hardware key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果密钥是硬件密钥;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到加密服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a key container name.
trans-unit.target: 获取密钥容器名称。

trans-unit.source: The key container name.
trans-unit.target: 密钥容器名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that describes whether an asymmetric key was created as a signature key or an exchange key.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，描述非对称密钥被创建为签名密钥还是交换密钥。

trans-unit.source: The value of the KeyNumber property is derived from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber> field of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> object that was used to initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: KeyNumber 属性的值派生自<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber>字段<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>用于初始化的对象<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>对象。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber>

trans-unit.source: An exchange key is an asymmetric key pair used to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users.
trans-unit.target: 交换密钥是用于加密会话密钥，以便它们可以安全地存储以及与其他用户交换非对称密钥对。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber> value specifies an exchange key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber>值指定交换密钥。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber>

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 此值对应于`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`使用非托管在 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的值。

trans-unit.source: A signature key is an asymmetric key pair used for authenticating (digitally signed) messages or files.
trans-unit.target: 签名密钥是用于进行身份验证 （进行数字签名） 的消息或文件的非对称密钥对。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber> value specifies a signature key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber>值指定签名密钥。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber>

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI.
trans-unit.target: 此值对应于`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中使用的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber"></xref> values that describes whether an asymmetric key was created as a signature key or an exchange key.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber"></xref>描述非对称密钥被创建为签名密钥还是交换密钥的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a key is from a machine key set.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示密钥是否来自计算机密钥集。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is from the machine key set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果密钥来自计算机密钥集;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a key pair is protected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否受到保护的密钥对。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key pair is protected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果受保护的密钥对否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key type is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持的密钥类型。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到加密服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- The key container was not found.
trans-unit.target: -或者-找不到密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the provider name of a key.
trans-unit.target: 获取密钥的提供程序名称。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the cryptographic service provider that created the key.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定在创建密钥的加密服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The provider name.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the provider type of a key.
trans-unit.target: 获取密钥的提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are determined by the cryptographic service provider used to create the key.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用要创建密钥的加密服务提供程序确定有效的值。

trans-unit.source: Cryptographic service providers are generally organized into groups or families, each of which has its own set of data formats and processes.
trans-unit.target: 加密服务提供程序通常被组织到组或系列，其中每个都有其自己的数据格式和进程组。

trans-unit.source: Two families that use the same algorithm, such as the RC2 block cipher, often use different padding schemes, different key lengths, and different default modes.
trans-unit.target: 使用相同的算法，如 RC2 块密码的两个系列通常使用不同的填充方案、 不同的密钥长度和不同的默认模式。

trans-unit.source: The provider type.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序类型中。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a key container was randomly generated by a managed cryptography class.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否由托管的加密类随机生成密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: Usually, when a randomly generated key container is created, the key container is named "CLR{`guid value`}."
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，创建随机生成的密钥容器时，密钥容器名为"CLR {`guid value`}。"

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key container was randomly generated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果随机生成密钥容器;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a key can be removed from a key container.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以从密钥容器中删除密钥。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is removable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该密钥是可移动;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到加密服务提供程序 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique key container name.
trans-unit.target: 获取唯一的密钥容器名称。

trans-unit.source: The unique key container name.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的密钥容器名称中。

trans-unit.source: The key type is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持的密钥类型。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到加密服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- The key container was not found.
trans-unit.target: -或者-找不到密钥容器。
